front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Amendment Standard for Information Technology-- Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--LAN/MAN Specific Requirements-- Part 11 Wireless Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications: Medium Access Control (MAC) Quality of Service (Qos) Enhancements (Replaced by Approved IEEE Draft 802.11e/D13.0)
